multiagent

Class Bid

  • java.lang.Object
    • multiagent.Bid

  • public class Bid
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a bid an Agent can make, given an available task. The task is represented by a Cell.
    Version:
    1.1, 1.0 - May 22, 2013
    Author:
    Albani Dario, Federico Patota, Gabriele Buondonno

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Agent bidder
      The Agent making this Bid.
      int cost
      The estimated cost of reaching the given task for the Agent making this Bid.
      boolean isPropose
      This boolean represents the intention of the Agent to participate to the auction.
      Task task
      The task associated with the cell.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bid(boolean isPropose, Task task, int cost, Agent bidder) 

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • isPropose

        public final boolean isPropose
        This boolean represents the intention of the Agent to participate to the auction. If it is true, the Agent is interested, otherwise it's not.

      • task

        public final Task task
        The task associated with the cell.

      • cost

        public final int cost
        The estimated cost of reaching the given task for the Agent making this Bid.

      • bidder

        public final Agent bidder
        The Agent making this Bid.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bid

           Task task,
           int cost,
           Agent bidder)
